sessions.title: Session 1: New Feature Overview
sessions.body: Gear up, CPU Freshmen! We're roaring with excitement to welcome you to the #CPULife! Get ready to unleash your inner scholar, unleash your potential, and become a true Centralian. From top-notch academics to vibrant campus life, CPU offers everything you need to make memories that last a lifetime.
